document.full_text: british film star jude law will sue the news of the world over allegations of phone hacking next year in a case to set guidelines over damages and which could involve senior management at the tabloid.
document.title: jude law joins news corp phone hacking claimants
lines_and_colors: british film star jude law will sue the news of the world over allegations of phone hacking next year in a case to set guidelines over damages and which could involve senior management at the tabloid.
